mapper.insert: insert into TB_CAB003D (BOARD_ID, POST_ID, REPLY_ID, UPPER_REPLY_ID, CN, HIDDN_YN, PASSWD, IMG_FILE_GRP_ID, ATTCH_FILE_GRP_ID, DEL_YN, REGIST_USR_ID, REGIST_DT, UPDT_USR_ID, UPDT_DT) values (#{boardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{replyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upperReplyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cn,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{hiddnYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgFileGrpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attchFileGrpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'N', #{registUsrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, getdate(), #{updtUsrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, getdate())
mapper.update: update TB_CAB003D set UPPER_REPLY_ID = #{upperReplyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CN = #{cn,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, HIDDN_YN = #{hiddnYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWD = #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMG_FILE_GRP_ID = #{imgFileGrpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTCH_FILE_GRP_ID = #{attchFileGrpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_YN = 'N', REGIST_USR_ID = #{registUsrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGIST_DT = getdate(), UPDT_USR_ID = #{updtUsrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDT_DT = getdate() where BOARD_ID = #{boardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and POST_ID = #{postId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and REPLY_ID = #{replyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
